name: vscode-abap-remote-fs
description: Work on your ABAP code straight from the server

scripts.vscode:prepublish: cd client && npm run update-vscode && cd .. && npm run compile
scripts.clean: rm -Rf out *.vsix;cd server && npm run clean&& cd ../client &&npm run clean &&cd ../sharedtypes&& npm run clean
scripts.postinstall: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
